name: Serch it
description:
this is a fast made game! that has a random generated terrain!

Objectiveis to unlock all the achievements as fast as possible ! and the hardest achievements so far is to find a blue box!

enjoy!

Comment your high score (in seconds and points!)

(sorry if i spell wrong)

(the game is called serch it. and its nothing wrong in the titel)
